content: 18 18 18 20 knit to end round 1 knit stitches round 2 k3 3 4 4 6 7 8 p12 14 14 18 18 on hold 18 20 knit to end heel work rounds 1-2 until cuff measures 2 2 5 4 5 flap 5 5 6 5 7 5 8 from cast-on ending with a work in row round 2 heel flap set-up k18 20 22 26 30 32 36 place these sts picked up stitches on hold you will work the heel flap back at both edges of heel flap and forth in row over the next 18 20 22 26 30 32 36 sts heel row 1 rs sl1 knit to end turn row 2 ws sl1 purl to end work in row work row 1-2 a total of 8 8 10 12 14 16 18 times this is 16 16 20 24 28 32 36 row gusset heel turn & foot work in the heel is turned by working a series of short row rounds set-up row 1 rs sl1 k10 12 12 14 16 18 20 ssk k1 turn work set-up row 2 ws sl1 p5 7 5 5 5 7 7 p2tog decreases p1 turn work row 3 rs sl1 knit to 1 st before the gap ssk k1 turn work row 4 ws sl1 purl to 1 st before the gap toe p2tog p1 turn work work in rounds work row 3-4 a total of 2 2 3 4 5 5 6 times - all sts have been worked and 12 14 14 16 18 20 22 sts remain decreases next row rs knit across these heel stitches rye socks - sock facebook-square instagram ravelry pinterest envelope www tincanknits com 3 gusset toe the sock gusset is formed by picking up stitches the toe is shaped by decreases then grafted then working in the round while decreasing closed pick up and knit 10 10 12 14 16 18 20 sts round 1 k1 ssk knit to 3 sts before marker along the edge of the heel flap pm k2tog k1 sm twice 4 sts decrease work in pattern across top of foot keeping the round 2 knit garter panel as established pm work rounds 1-2 a total of 4 4 5 6 6 7 8 times pick up and knit the same number of sts as above 20 24 24 28 36 36 40 sts along the other edge of heel flap work round 1 a further 2 2 2 2 4 3 4 times k6 7 7 8 9 10 11 place new bor marker 12 16 16 20 20 24 24 sts located at the bottom of the foot cut yarn leaving a 12 tail graft the toe closed 50 54 60 70 80 88 98 sts finishing round 1 knit round 2 knit to 3 sts before marker k2tog k1 weave in your ends and block your socks sm work in pattern across top of foot to marker share
